jdText:
CloudSync Technologies is seeking a Product Manager to lead our B2B SaaS platform team. You will own the product roadmap, work with engineering to prioritize features, and engage with enterprise customers to understand their needs.

Requirements:
- 3-5 years of product management experience
- Strong understanding of SaaS metrics (MRR, churn, CAC)
- Experience with agile development processes
- Excellent stakeholder management skills
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Business, or related field

Nice to have:
- Prior startup experience
- Technical background with ability to read code
- Experience with enterprise B2B sales cycles
- Knowledge of cloud infrastructure
resumeText:
Jane Smith
Product Manager | Ex-Startup Founder

EXPERIENCE:
Product Manager, TechCorp (2020-2023)
- Led product development for SaaS analytics platform serving 500+ customers
- Reduced churn by 15% through feature prioritization based on customer feedback
- Managed cross-functional team of 8 engineers, 2 designers
- Implemented agile sprint planning and improved velocity by 25%

Associate PM, DataFlow Inc (2018-2020)
- Supported senior PM on B2B workflow automation product
- Conducted user interviews and synthesized findings into product requirements
- Tracked key metrics: MRR growth, customer acquisition cost

EDUCATION:
BS Computer Science, Stanford University (2018)

SKILLS:
Product Strategy, Roadmapping, Agile/Scrum, SQL, Jira, User Research, A/B Testing
notesText: Found this through referral from Mike at TechCorp. Company is Series B, about 80 employees. Team seems collaborative based on Glassdoor reviews. Salary range mentioned: $140k-$170k + equity.
